sentences.en: Arcane Crystal is only a fuse can be out of silver?
sentences.cn: 奥术水晶是否只有富瑟银矿能出?

sentences.en: Arcane Material Component: A lodestone and a pinch of dust.
sentences.cn: 奥术材料成分: 一块天然磁石和一小撮灰尘.

sentences.en: Arcane with Giggles your helper imp by your side.
sentences.cn: 六探索神秘境界土地的细节与欢笑你帮手小鬼你身旁.

sentences.en: Austrian: Arcane sensitive wand of specialism, and strengthen the suppression magic.
sentences.cn: 奥: 奥术敏锐、魔杖专精 、 强化抑制魔法.

sentences.en: Empowered Arcane Missiles renamed Arcane Empowerment and no longer increases mana cost.
sentences.cn: 强化魔法飞弹被重新命名为奥术强化并且不再增加魔法消耗.

sentences.en: Equip: Increases Arcane spells and effects by up to 36.
sentences.cn: 装备: 提高奥术法术和效果造成的伤害,最多36点.

sentences.en: He wanders through a mysterious world of arcane theology.
sentences.cn: 他在奇妙的神学领域的神秘世界之中穿梭.

sentences.en: It now also increases damage caused by Arcane Blast.
sentences.cn: 现在该天赋同时增加奥术冲击的伤害加成.

sentences.en: Mana Adept : Arcane will deal damage based how much mana mage has.
sentences.cn: 法力娴熟: 奥法输出的伤害将基于法师有多少法力.

sentences.en: Sorcerer's nukes come in 3 elements: arcane, fire and ice.
sentences.cn: 魔术师的攻击有3种元素属性: 神秘, 火,冰.

sentences.en: the arcane language of the law
The city's arcane political structure has also been streamlined.
sentences.cn: 而且,该市纠结的政治结构也已得到优化.

sentences.en: The technique at one time was arcane in the minds of most chemists.
sentences.cn: 这种技术在大多数化学家心目中一度是神秘的.

sentences.en: This dispute at the heart of Iran's ruling establishment may seem arcane.
sentences.cn: 而这种伊朗统治核心的争端看着让人费解.

sentences.en: Until a few months ago few people outside the arcane world of contemporary music had heard of Gorecki.
sentences.cn: 直至几个月前，在现代音乐神秘殿堂之外很少有人听说了戈莱斯基。

sentences.en: Use: Absorbs 2800 to 4000 arcane damage. Lasts 2 min.
sentences.cn: 使用: 吸收2800到4000点奥术伤害. 持续2分钟.

words.tran_cn: 神秘的；晦涩难解的；秘传的

trans.tran_cn: 秘密的，神秘的，晦涩难解的
trans.tran_en: Something that is arcane is secret or mysterious
